jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Understand the relevant regulations for the industry and design framework for the company to comply with those regulations
● Monitor company products and processes to ensure compliance to relevant regulations
● Lead efforts to create and manage company policies to support implementation of regulation
● Conduct compliance socialization and training for internal stakeholders
● Ensure that all required compliance reporting and document submissions to regulation bodies are completed and properly submitted
● Support Legal and Government Relations departments as needed to fulfill company’s regulation requirements
● Maintain relationships and coordinate with relevant industry associations and government institutions to support company’s activities

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

• Min. Bachelor's degree/S1 from reputable local or overseas universities
  • Min. 5 years working experience, preferably in fields such as Compliance, Legal, or Government Relations
  • Experience working in the government or financial services industry is a plus
